source.b653dc7b:
X = df.drop(columns=["population","change_perc","net_change","urban_perc"],axis = 1)
y = df["population"]

import statsmodels.api as sms
lm = sms.OLS(y,X)
model = lm.fit()
model.summary()

source.8e7f013f:
### Variable Description:

1. Year: 1951 to 2020
1. Population: World Population
1. ChangePerc: Yearly Change in Percentage
1. NetChange: Total Yearly Change
1. Density: Density in P/Km²
1. Urban: Urban Population
1. UrbanPerc: Urban Population Percentage
